list.name: AutoVid.ai
list.description: AI Generated Human Video (Convert text to studio quality videos).

projects.description: Implementing High Quality AI Video Driven by Audio.
which: Implemented new Research Paper published by Google for High Quality Video Generation.
Created Advanced Video Creator and Content Editable Webpage[Salespage] On Frontend as well as Server Side Rendering
Created Many REST API for AI Avatar Based Video Creator and deploy to production.
Worked On Full Body AI Based Talking Video which are driven by Text or Audio.
